optic.plot.constHist

constHist(symb, ax, cmap='turbo', whiteb=True)

Generate histogram-based constellation plot.

Parameters:

  • symb (np.array) -- Complex-valued constellation symbols.

  • ax (axis object handle) -- axis of the plot.

Returns:

ax -- axis of the plot.

Return type:

axis object handle
